name: Beware the Wyooter!
description:
Legend has it that a horrible creature lurks in the Tennessee mountains.  Few have faced it, but none have survived the encounter.

You get a call at about half-past ten.  It's your boyfriend, and he wants you to come over.  You can't take your car because the sound of starting it will wake your parents.  Your boyfriend lives a few minutes down the road, so taking the trip by foot won't be much trouble.  You quietly sneak out through your bedroom window and begin to head down the quiet mountain road...

So enjoy your time in the Tennessee mountains, and let the calm forest breeze sooth your body and mind.

Just don't let your guard down...

BEWARE THE WYOOTER!
